Changes
=======

0.3.1
-----

2010-09-16
~~~~~~~~~~

* Added a ``redirect()`` method to the marble

0.3.0
-----

2010-09-01
~~~~~~~~~~

* Dispatch based on a range of popular patterns eg ``area/name.py``,
  ``area/name/action.py`` or ``name.py``.
* Dispatch directly to handlers specified in the URLConf.

0.2.0
-----

2010-02-04
~~~~~~~~~~

* First version
